value.name: Ernest Scherer III guilty of killing parents
value.description: Video showed the younger Scherer's 2001 Camaro convertible in the area of the club around the time the couple were killed, said Deputy District Attorney Michael Nieto.

value.name: Professional poker player convicted of murdering parents
value.description: They had been brutally beaten and stabbed. Prosecutor Michael Nieto told jurors he believes they were killed a week earlier, on March 7, 2008. In his closing argument last week, Nieto alleged that ...
